contents:
Your Result: Social Liberal 89%

Social liberalism espouses a balance between social equality and individual liberty and supports government intervention to achieve such a goal. Social liberals support a regulated market economy, but oppose nationalization, differentiating them from many more left-wing social democrats. Socially, they support many liberal causes, such as same-sex marriage and abortion. In the US, social liberals also tend to support some degree of gun control.

Social Democrat 76%
Christian Democrat 72%
Market Liberalism 70%
Anarchist 42%
Paleoconservative 28%
Neoconservative 26%
Fascist 16%
Marxist Communist 16%
Authoritarian Socialist 16%

除去第一名，仍然是属于社会主义派系...
